doc:
Joe Son https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Son 0 Joseph Hyungmin Son (Korean: 손형민; born November 22, 1970) is a South Korean-born American convicted felon and a former mixed martial artist and actor. He is currently serving life in prison in California for torture. Joseph_Hyungmin_Son ( Korean : 손형민 ; born November_22_,_1970 ) is a_South_Korean-born_American_convicted_felon and a_former_mixed_martial_artist_and_actor . He is_currently_serving life in prison in California for torture .
